Conducted a detailed study of the basic comptrollers used in IOT (Internet Of Things). Started working over HDL (Hardware Development Languages). In that particular time period we designed more than 30 projects in IOT using NodeMCU as the major controller board.

"""

posts:

[Posted]

CONTENT:
"""
Every number tells a story.
And mine is built on classrooms, conversations, and continuous learning.

‚ú® 25,000+ students - introduced to logic building, design thinking, and AI tools
 ‚ú® 5,000+ teachers - equipped with innovative teaching methods and pedagogy
 ‚ú® 2,000+ workshops and webinars - across IIT Delhi, IIITD, MNNIT, JNVs, KVs, DPS, and more

From schools in metro cities to campuses in emerging towns -
It‚Äôs been an incredible journey of sharing knowledge, exchanging ideas, and building future-ready minds.

Here‚Äôs a short glimpse into the work I‚Äôve been passionately driving over the years.

üé• Watch the video.

 Let‚Äôs connect, collaborate, and create new learning experiences together.
- Exa.Ravi

#ExaRavi #EducationMatters #AIinEducation #DesignThinking #TeacherTraining #Workshops #Webinars #IndiaLearns #FutureReady #EdTechIndia #LearningByDoing #CollaborationForChange
"""

[Posted]
REACTIONS: 7 (LIKE), 1 (APPRECIATION)
COMMENTS: 0
SHARES: 0
CONTENT:
"""
School taught us sine, cosine, and Pythagoras...
But not how to survive a breakup, fix a tap, or speak to 500 people.

Topped the class ‚úÖ
Solved quadratic equations ‚úÖ
But froze during my first public speech.
Panicked opening my first bank account.
Struggled to handle failure or emotional pressure.

That‚Äôs when it hit me -
Maybe school gave us marks... but missed life.

So I created this post to highlight what the curriculum skipped (but life demands):

üó£ Public Speaking ‚Äì Not just debates, but real confidence.
üí∞ Financial Literacy ‚Äì Because ‚Äúfile your ITR‚Äù shouldn‚Äôt sound like rocket science.
üíî Emotional Strength ‚Äì For handling failure, pressure, and relationships.
üß∞ Basic Life Skills ‚Äì Yes, even fixing a bulb or a tap.

Let‚Äôs be real:

Marks never prepared us for Monday mornings or adulthood mess.
Skills do.

üí¨ What‚Äôs one skill you wish school actually taught you?
Drop it in the comments üëá - Let‚Äôs make this a reality-check thread.

Wanna learn what school didn‚Äôt?

üîπ Follow @Exa.Ravi
üîπ Comment "REAL SKILLS" and start unlearning + relearning.

#SchoolVsLife #RealSkillsMatter #EducationReform #SoftSkills #LifeAfterSchool #ExaRaviSays #Upskill #LearnForLife
"""

[Reshared a post]
RESHARED FROM:
- COMPANY: CoGrad
REACTIONS: 9 (LIKE)
COMMENTS: 0
SHARES: 0
ORIGINAL CONTENT:
"""
Transforming Education with Innovation at Cograd! 

At Cograd, 2024 has been a year of impactful initiatives and groundbreaking achievements. Here‚Äôs a glimpse of our journey:

Global Exposure & Personal Growth
	‚Ä¢	Our Cograd Schools enriched learning through¬†excursion tours, Prerna motivational sessions, the US Buddy Program, and tech workshops, fostering innovation and hands-on experiences.

R.I.S.E Program (Redefining Innovative Strategies in Education)
	‚Ä¢	Launched with MNNIT Allahabad, this program¬†empowers teachers¬†through training, hands-on practice, and collaborative networking, accelerating professional growth.

Medha AI ‚Äì Revolutionizing Classrooms
	‚Ä¢	Medha AI¬†automates administrative tasks, generates interactive lesson plans, and provides personalized support¬†‚Äì even without internet, boosting classroom efficiency.

Mera Bachha App
	‚Ä¢	Connecting rural parents with their child‚Äôs academic journey,¬†Mera Bachha app¬†tracks education and activities via a voice-based interface, ensuring inclusive growth.

AI for Youth Program
	‚Ä¢	542 students acquired¬†AI skills through project-based learning, fostering creativity, critical thinking, and problem-solving for careers in emerging technologies.

NCF Portal
	‚Ä¢	Simplifying NCF 2023, our portal offers¬†interactive resources and tools¬†to help educators implement curriculum changes, enhancing holistic student development.

Project Gyaan Shakti
	‚Ä¢	Empowering¬†30,000+ students¬†with emerging tech skills and aptitude testing, aligning with PM SHRI goals to nurture innovation and career readiness.

We‚Äôre thrilled about the impact we‚Äôve made and excited for what lies ahead. Together, let‚Äôs shape the future of education! 

Himanshu Saurabh Prashant Abhay Abhinav Yosita Akash Dr. Shivesh Sharanya TomoClub Ravi ANTRIKSH Alok 

#EducationInnovation #AIinEducation #EdTech #StudentEmpowerment #TeacherTraining #FutureReady
"""

School taught us sine, cosine, and Pythagoras...
But not how to survive a breakup, fix a tap, or speak to 500 people.

Topped the class ‚úÖ
Solved quadratic equations ‚úÖ
But froze during my first public speech.

That‚Äôs when it hit me -
Maybe school gave us marks... but missed life.

So I created this post to highlight what the curriculum skipped (but life demands):

üó£ Public Speaking ‚Äì Not just debates, but real confidence.
üí∞ Financial Literacy ‚Äì Because ‚Äúfile your ITR‚Äù shouldn‚Äôt sound like rocket science.
üíî Emotional Strength ‚Äì For handling failure, pressure, and relationships.
üß∞ Basic Life Skills ‚Äì Yes, even fixing a bulb or a tap.

text.text:
Transforming Education with Innovation at Cograd! 

At Cograd, 2024 has been a year of impactful initiatives and groundbreaking achievements. Here‚Äôs a glimpse of our journey:

Global Exposure & Personal Growth
	‚Ä¢	Our Cograd Schools enriched learning through¬†excursion tours, Prerna motivational sessions, the US Buddy Program, and tech workshops, fostering innovation and hands-on experiences.

R.I.S.E Program (Redefining Innovative Strategies in Education)
	‚Ä¢	Launched with MNNIT Allahabad, this program¬†empowers teachers¬†through training, hands-on practice, and collaborative networking, accelerating professional growth.

Medha AI ‚Äì Revolutionizing Classrooms
	‚Ä¢	Medha AI¬†automates administrative tasks, generates interactive lesson plans, and provides personalized support¬†‚Äì even without internet, boosting classroom efficiency.

Mera Bachha App
	‚Ä¢	Connecting rural parents with their child‚Äôs academic journey,¬†Mera Bachha app¬†tracks education and activities via a voice-based interface, ensuring inclusive growth.

AI for Youth Program
	‚Ä¢	542 students acquired¬†AI skills through project-based learning, fostering creativity, critical thinking, and problem-solving for careers in emerging technologies.

NCF Portal
	‚Ä¢	Simplifying NCF 2023, our portal offers¬†interactive resources and tools¬†to help educators implement curriculum changes, enhancing holistic student development.

Project Gyaan Shakti
	‚Ä¢	Empowering¬†30,000+ students¬†with emerging tech skills and aptitude testing, aligning with PM SHRI goals to nurture innovation and career readiness.

We‚Äôre thrilled about the impact we‚Äôve made and excited for what lies ahead. Together, let‚Äôs shape the future of education! 

Himanshu Saurabh Prashant Abhay Abhinav Yosita Akash Dr. Shivesh Sharanya TomoClub Ravi ANTRIKSH Alok 

#EducationInnovation #AIinEducation #EdTech #StudentEmpowerment #TeacherTraining #FutureReady
